title: 1.12.2的function怎么给副手有指定物品的玩家一个tag 物品拿下来后tag删除
author: Errorsans
txt_content:
又是我 指令渣
我现在只差指定物品拿下副手后tag删除的指令了

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
/scoreboard players tag @a remove a
/scoreboard players tag @a add a {Inventory:[{Slot:-106b,id:"minecraft:stone"}]}

replies.author: Errorsans
replies.txt_content:
